sect2.title: Installation de GnuCash
sect2.para: Installez GnuCash en lançant les commandes suivantes:

screen.userinput:
sed 's/^GTKHTML_LIBS.*$/GTKHTML_LIBS=\`pkg-config --libs gtkhtml-1.1\`/' \configure | \ sed 's/^GTKHTML_CFLAGS.*$/GTKHTML_CFLAGS=\`pkg-config --cflags gtkhtml-1.1\`/' > configure.new && cp configure.new configure &&
./configure --prefix=/opt/gnome && make && make install
